function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dependence on outdoor weather conditions for HVAC loads","Impact":"Increased energy usage and inefficiency during extreme weather conditions","Mitigation":"Implementing weather normalization techniques and efficient HVAC systems","Technologies":"Weather normalization algorithms, smart HVAC systems","People":"Building occupants, energy analysts","Owner":"Building management, energy consultants"},{"Description":"Inaccurate load characterization of non-HVAC loads","Impact":"Misrepresentation of energy usage and inability to identify energy efficiency opportunities","Mitigation":"Improving data collection methods and ensuring accurate load profiling","Technologies":"Advanced data collection sensors, IoT devices for energy monitoring","People":"Energy analysts, building management","Owner":"Energy consultants, building owners"},{"Description":"Limited comparison of HVAC consumption across years","Impact":"Inability to assess improvements or changes in HVAC efficiency over time","Mitigation":"Using linear regression models and weather normalization for fair comparison","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software, weather data normalization tools","People":"Energy analysts, researchers","Owner":"Research organizations, energy consultancy firms"}]}
